title: Classic Homemade Stuffing for Thanksgiving Family
promptIMG: Classic Traditional Stuffing, on plate, natural food photography, balanced sharp focus, zero blur throughout entire image, infinite depth of field, realistic food textures, modern kitchen background in sharp focus, natural lighting, kitchen countertop visible, even focus distribution, documentary food photography, natural sharpness --no blur, depth of field, bokeh, over-sharpening, artificial enhancement --quality 2 --raw --stylize 300
description: This Classic Traditional Homemade Stuffing is the ultimate Thanksgiving side dish that brings comfort and joy to your table. Made with fresh sourdough bread and aromatic Italian seasoning, it's a must-try for family gatherings. Dive into this delicious recipe and elevate your holiday feast!
instructions: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat and sauté the diced vegetables until softened.
In a large bowl, combine the cubed sourdough bread, sautéed vegetables, Italian seasoning, and broth. Mix well.
Transfer the mixture to a greased baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes until golden brown on top.
tips: For perfect results, ensure your bread is slightly stale for better absorption of flavors.

structured_content.content: This Classic Traditional Homemade Stuffing is a staple at Thanksgiving, bringing warmth and flavor to your holiday table. The combination of sourdough bread and Italian seasoning creates a delightful texture and taste that everyone will love.

note.label: Why You'll Love This Recipe
note.content:
• Quick and easy to make in under 30 minutes
  • Restaurant-quality flavors at home
  • Perfect for Thanksgiving and family gatherings
  • Uses simple ingredients you likely have on hand
  • Customizable with your favorite herbs and vegetables

structured_content.content: Growing up, stuffing was always the highlight of our Thanksgiving dinner. The aroma of herbs and butter filling the kitchen brings back cherished memories of family gatherings and laughter.

• Main ingredient: Sourdough bread adds a unique flavor and texture that enhances the stuffing.
  • Key seasonings/flavoring agents: Italian seasoning brings a fragrant blend of herbs that elevates the dish.
  • Supporting ingredients: Vegetables like onion and celery provide moisture and flavor.
  • Equipment needed: A large skillet and a baking dish are essential for this recipe.

upload.context: Preparation of sourdough bread and vegetables for stuffing.

structured_content.content:
Preparation:
Start by cubing the sourdough bread and dicing the vegetables. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cooking/Baking Process:
In a skillet, melt butter and sauté the vegetables until soft. Combine with bread and broth, then transfer to a baking dish.
Finishing Touches:
Bake until the top is golden brown, then serve warm.

upload.context: Cooking process of the stuffing in the skillet.

note.label: You Must Know
note.content:
• Use stale bread for better texture and flavor absorption.
  • Avoid overmixing to keep the stuffing light and fluffy.
  • It’s ready when the top is crispy and golden.
  • Store leftovers in an airtight container and reheat in the oven.

structured_content.content: Sharing this stuffing with family during the holidays is always a joy. It's a dish that brings everyone together, creating lasting memories around the dinner table.
Enhance your stuffing with fresh herbs like parsley or thyme, or add nuts for a crunchy texture. You can also experiment with different types of bread for unique flavors.
This stuffing pairs beautifully with roast turkey, cranberry sauce, and a side of green beans for a complete Thanksgiving meal.
For a gluten-free option, substitute with gluten-free bread. You can also make it vegan by using vegetable broth and omitting butter.

upload.context: Final plated dish of stuffing ready to serve.

note.label: Pro Tips
note.content:
• Toast the bread cubes for extra crunch.
  • Let the stuffing sit for a few minutes before serving for better flavor.
  • Use homemade broth for richer taste.
  • Garnish with fresh herbs for an impressive presentation.

structured_content.content: Enjoy making this stuffing and feel the joy it brings to your table. You’ll be proud to share this delicious dish with your loved ones!
